AmountDC.name: AmountDC
AmountDC.description: Amount in the default currency of the company

AmountFC.name: AmountFC
AmountFC.description: Amount in the currency of the transaction

CustomField.name: CustomField
CustomField.description: Custom field endpoint. Provided only for the Exact Online Premium users.

Description.name: Description
Description.description: Description of the purchase order line

Expense.name: Expense
Expense.description: Expense related to the Work Breakdown Structure of the selected project. Only available with a professional service license

ExpenseDescription.name: ExpenseDescription
ExpenseDescription.description: Description of expense. Only available with a professional service license

InStock.name: InStock
InStock.description: The current stock level of items shown in stock unit. The information is displayed only for items with the stock property selected.

InvoicedQuantity.name: InvoicedQuantity
InvoicedQuantity.description: Quantity of item that has been invoiced

IsBatchNumberItem.name: IsBatchNumberItem
IsBatchNumberItem.description: Indicates that an Item is an batch item

IsSerialNumberItem.name: IsSerialNumberItem
IsSerialNumberItem.description: Indicates that an Item is an serial item

Item.name: Item
Item.description: Reference to the item for purchase order

ItemBarcodeAdditional.name: ItemBarcodeAdditional
ItemBarcodeAdditional.description: This is the barcode for the unit other than standard unit of the item. Only supported by the Premium for Wholesale & Distribution and Manufacturing

ItemDivisable.name: ItemDivisable
ItemDivisable.description: Indicates if fractional quantities of the item can be used, for example quantity = 0.4

NetPrice.name: NetPrice
NetPrice.description: The net price is the unit price (VAT code taken into account) with any discount applied

Project.name: Project
Project.description: Reference to project. Only available with a professional service license

ProjectCode.name: ProjectCode
ProjectCode.description: Project code. Only available with a professional service license

ProjectDescription.name: ProjectDescription
ProjectDescription.description: Description of the project. Only available with a professional service license

ProjectedStock.name: ProjectedStock
ProjectedStock.description: The current stock level + the planned quantity to be received - the planned quantity to deliver shown in stock unit.

PurchaseOrderID.name: PurchaseOrderID
PurchaseOrderID.description: Identifies the purchase order. All the lines of a purchase order have the same PurchaseOrderID

QuantityInPurchaseUnits.name: QuantityInPurchaseUnits
QuantityInPurchaseUnits.description: Quantity in purchase units. Use this field when creating a purchase order

Rebill.name: Rebill
Rebill.description: Indicates whether the purchase order line needs to be rebilled. Only available with a professional service license

ReceiptDate.name: ReceiptDate
ReceiptDate.description: Date the goods are expected to be received

SalesOrder.name: SalesOrder
SalesOrder.description: Sales order that is linked to a back to back sales order in purchase order. Show NULL if more than one sales order is linked to the purchase order line.

SalesOrderLine.name: SalesOrderLine
SalesOrderLine.description: Sales order line of the sales order that Is linked to a back to back sales order in purchase order. Show NULL if more than one sales order is linked to the purchase order line.

SalesOrderLineNumber.name: SalesOrderLineNumber
SalesOrderLineNumber.description: Number of the sales order line. Show NULL if more than one sales order is linked to the purchase order line.

SalesOrderNumber.name: SalesOrderNumber
SalesOrderNumber.description: Number of the sales order. Show NULL if more than one sales order is linked to the purchase order line.

ShopOrderMaterialPlans.name: ShopOrderMaterialPlans
ShopOrderMaterialPlans.description: Collection of Shop order Material plans

ShopOrderRoutingStepPlans.name: ShopOrderRoutingStepPlans
ShopOrderRoutingStepPlans.description: Collection of Shop order Routing step plans

SupplierItemCode.name: SupplierItemCode
SupplierItemCode.description: Code the supplier uses for this item

SupplierItemCopyRemarks.name: SupplierItemCopyRemarks
SupplierItemCopyRemarks.description: Indicate if the notes content should be copied from SupplierItem's remarks. The default follows the CopyRemarks value from SupplierItem. Values: 0 = Do not copy remark, 1 = Copy remark

VATAmount.name: VATAmount
VATAmount.description: Amount of VAT charges calculated from total amount and vat percentage

VATCode.name: VATCode
VATCode.description: The VAT code used when the invoice was registered

VATPercentage.name: VATPercentage
VATPercentage.description: The VAT percentage of the VAT code. This is the percentage at the moment the invoice is created. It's also used by the default calculation of VAT amounts and VAT base amounts

endpoint_info.good_to_know: Use this endpoint to : • Create a new purchase order line. • Read existing purchase order lines. • Update an existing purchase order line • Remove an existing purchase order line. Purchase order lines may not be posted individually. They should be part of the PurchaseOrder Post. When using the POST method of this endpoint to create a purchase order line it is mandatory to provide an Item and Quantity. When deleting a purchase order line, a purchase order must have at least one line. If necessary delete the complete purchase order.For more information about the  functionality in Exact Online, see Overview | Purchase orders.
